titles.title: Neil A. Armstrong Test Facility Act
Neil A. Armstrong Test Facility Act
Neil A. Armstrong Test Facility Act
Neil A. Armstrong Test Facility Act
A bill to redesignate the NASA John H. Glenn Research Center at Plum Brook Station, Ohio, as the NASA John H. Glenn Research Center at the Neil A. Armstrong Test Facility.
Neil A. Armstrong Test Facility Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

calendar.text: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Reported by Senator Wicker without amendment. With written report No. 116-218.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 433.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Ms. Horn, Kendra S. moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on S. 2472.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary:
Neil A. Armstrong Test Facility Act
This bill redesignates the NASA John H. Glenn Research Center at Plum Brook Station in Ohio as the "NASA John H. Glenn Research Center at the Neil A. Armstrong Test Facility."
